title: Selune's Spear of Night
content:
. Common symbology certainly rejects the assumption of virginity. More to the point, ’maiden' itself carries some dusty connotations. How about Lunar Lady? Keeps the alliteration. too.’ - Marqaery Henderplum. Spear Thrown Versatile 1.35 640

Selune's Spear of Night

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d8 (1d6)+3 Piercing

Selune's Blessing: You gain Advantage on Wisdom Saving Throws and Perception Checks.

Darkvision: You can see in the dark up to 12m.

Weapon Enchantment +3

MoonbeamLevel 3
